titleStmt.title: An elegie upon the death of that famous and faithful minister and martyr, Mr. James Renwick composed immediately after his execution at Edinburgh. February 17th. 1688.
titleStmt.author: Shields, Alexander, 1660?-1700.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the year 1688. Edinburgh, re-printed 1690.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; copy tightly bound and stained with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
